column4: Characters (list all involved, any order, separated by comma)

column5: [Arg] "Did you sleep at all last night? *sit* I couldn't sleep a fuckin' wink." (3) [Kall] "Not less than usual." (2) [Arg] "I bet it was those mushrooms that hermit made us eat last night... I knew they looked funny.  What was he doin' picking those up last night anyways?" (4) [Kall] "hm." (2) [Arg]  "I bet they were poisonous.  If I end up dyin' tonight, you know whose fault it is." (3) [Kall] "What happens, happens..." (2)

[Lura] "Hey, I got some great news!  I read the signs last night, and today's travels should be safe!" (4) [Snäll] "Well that's good to hear!  What were the signs this time?" (3) [Lura] "I saw a raven flying away from the graves we made last night, so their souls should be protecting us today!" (4) [Snäll] "I'm sure Tyst will appreciate the help." (3) [Lura] "What do you think's on the other side of the forest?" (3) [Snäll] "..." (2) [Lura] "... I asked Kall and all they said was somewhere else." (3) [Snäll] "*chuckles* Somewhere better than here, I trust Tyst." (2) [Lura] "It will be." (3)

column1: Snäll and Kall talking about the attack
column5: [Snäll] "...Hey." (2) [Kall] "..." (2) [Snäll] "Been a while since we last talked." (3) [Kall] "Yeah." (1) [Snäll] "Before it all happened, I think." (3) [Kall] "The rain of silent death." (2) [Snäll] "How've you been taking it?" (3) [Kall] "Dunno...  How about you?  You lost some pretty important things back there." (2) [Snäll] "..." (2) [Kall] "Like that music box you kept insisting on playing.  Couldn't stand that as a kid." (3) [Snäll] "*chuckles* You saying you like it now?" (4) [Kall] "..." (1) [Kall] "No.  But at least it'd be something." (2)

[Snäll] "it's a nice day today." (3) [Arg] "what're you talkin' about?  It's raining." (3) [Snäll]  "I love sitting inside with a nice hot drink watching the rain calmly fall from above.  It lets me think." (3) [Arg] "I can't fuckin' stand it.  You can relax to the constant tapping of rain?  The unending noise digs into my brain." (4) [Snäll] "I can understand that." (3) [Arg] "All it does is remind me of the reason why we're out in the rain in the first place." (3) [Snäll] "I've accepted what happened by now, it's not like we can do anything about it anymore..." (3) [Arg] "and you're fuckin' OK with that?  You're just gonna let it slide?   What, are you forgiving them now?" (5) [Snäll] "Of course not.  I just don't want to brood over things I can't change." (4) [Arg] "hmph.  You're starting to sound like the quiet one over there." (3) [Snäll] "I'll take that as a compliment." (2)

[Lura] "Hey, Kall!  How've you been?" (4) [Kall] "I've been worse." (2) [Kall] "..." (2) [Lura] "..." (2) [Lura] "You're supposed to ask me that question now." (4) [Kall] "Why?" (2) [Lura] "'Cause it's polite!" (4) [Kall] "...Fine.  How are you doing." (1) [Lura] "I'm doing ok, thanks for asking!" (3) [Kall] "..." (1) [Lura] "..." (1)

column1: Arg and Lura talk about rocks
column5: [Arg] "Stubbed my foot again today.  When is the hermit gonna fuckin' clean up this place?  It's littered with rocks." (3) [Lura] "Oh that's not good!  I'll clean those up today, stones could be a bad omen anyways." (4) [Arg]  "Again with your fuckin' omens!  Did your "omens" tell you about that silent nightmare that fuckin' destroyed our homes?" (4) [Lura] "I-... don't want to talk about that." (3) [Lura] "...I guess I'll go clean up the rocks now..." (2)

column1: Kall and Lura greet each other
column5: [Lura] "Hey, Kall!  How've you been?" (3) [Kall] "I've been worse." (2) [Kall] "..." (2) [Lura] "..." (2) [Lura] "You're supposed to ask me that question now." (3) [Kall] "Why?" (2) [Lura] "'Cause it's polite!" (4) [Kall] "...Fine.  How are you doing." (1) [Lura] "I'm doing ok, thanks for asking!" (3) [Kall] "..." (2) [Lura] "..." (2)

[Aiyo] "Hey mom look, I found a four-leaf clover!" (4) [Lura] "Wow, that's amazing Aiyo!  Hold on to it and you'll have good luck all day!" (3) [Aiyo] "Why?" (3) [Lura] "Um... I... It's magic!" (3) [Aiyo] "What's that?" (3) [Lura] "Well it's an... energy present in all living things." (3) [Aiyo] "So I'm magic?" (4) [Lura] "Of course you are!" (4) [Aiyo] "*dances excitedly*" (3) [Aiyo] "Wait, why do I need the four-leaf clover then?" (3) [Lura] "Um... Well..." (2) [Lura] "I'll... explain when you're older." (3)

column1: Aiyo and Snäll talk about shrooms
column5: [Aiyo] "Yesterday's dinner was good!" (4) [Snäll] "Oh yeah, mushrooms are always tasty!" (3) [Aiyo] "Are those the weird looking vegetables?" (3) [Snäll] "Yeah they do look a bit funny, don't they?" (3) [Aiyo] "They look like little people in hats!" (4) [Snäll] *chuckles* "They do indeed." (3)

[Aiyo] "Why are you so sleepy all the time?" (3) [Kall] "I'm not sleepy." (2) [Aiyo] "But you act sleepy!" (4) [Kall] "..." (2) [Kall] "I'm just... apathetic." (2) [Aiyo] "What does that mean?" (3) [Kall] "..." (2) [Kall] "Ask Lura, I'm sure she knows." (2) [Aiyo] "Ok!  I'll ask Tyst to let you sleep more too." (4) [Kall] "..." (2)

column1: Arg stops Aiyo from throwing rocks
column5: [Arg] "Hey kid, Don't throw those rocks around like that.  Someone could get hurt."  (3) [Aiyo] "But I'm just throwing them at that tree over there!" (4) [Arg] "What if someone walks near that tree and it hits them instead?" (4) [Aiyo] "But I'm boooored!" (3) [Arg] "Then do somethin' that doesn't endanger you or the others!" (5) [Aiyo] "Like what?" (3) [Arg] "I dunno... go find some more kindling for the fire, there should be some just outside the camp over there." (3) [Aiyo] "But Mom said I can't leave the camp by myself..." (3) [Arg] "..." (3) [Aiyo] "...Could you come with me?" (2) [Arg] "....Fine.  As long as it'll stop you from throwin' those damn rocks around." (3)

[Aiyo] "...Mom?" (3) [Lura] "What is it, Aiyo?" (3) [Aiyo] "When can we go back?" (3) [Lura] "Go back where?" (3) [Aiyo] "Home." (3) [Lura] "..." (3) [Aiyo] "Isn't Dad waiting for us there?" (3) [Lura] "..." (3) [Lura] "Not... Not yet... We can't go home yet." (3) [Aiyo] "Why not?" (3) [Lura] "It's... A bad omen." (3)
